channel.title: Do you need host to make server?
channel.description: ok do you need a host to make a server? because i went on jbirdscape and asked if he pays for his server, and he said no, he just uses a home pc. meaning he didnt pay for host. so, whats the deal? people say you need a host to make server, but he didn't?

item.title: Do you need host to make server?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

The fact that he ran it off computer, means HE IS hosting it.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you need host to make server?

item.title: Do you need host to make server?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

no, for other people to come on, you eneed to host.

and you need to portforward

item.title: Do you need host to make server?
item.dc:creator: @bomzai bomzai
item.description:
@bomzai wrote:

I think every server needs a host to log in im not sure. Theres some weird stuff like hamachi or what ever. But i think if your planning on running a server just create a free host at no ip.
